Source.Name: shc
Source.Summary: shc is a generic shell script compiler,
Source.Description: A generic shell script compiler. Shc takes a script, which is specified on the command line and produces C source code. The generated source code is then compiled and linked to produce a stripped binary executable.

Package.Name: shc
Package.Summary: shc is a generic shell script compiler,
Package.Description: A generic shell script compiler. Shc takes a script, which is specified on the command line and produces C source code. The generated source code is then compiled and linked to produce a stripped binary executable.
